text: Charles Henry Mosley III (December 26, 1959 â€“ November 9, 2017) was an American singer-songwriter. He was best known as the frontman for Faith No More from 1984 to 1988. During his time with the band, they released two albums, We Care a Lot and Introduce Yourself. Mosley died on November 9, 2017 from complications of alcoholism in Cleveland, Ohio at the age of 57. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Chuck Mosley Interview on Songfacts site Category:1959 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Drug-related deaths in the United States Category:American singer-songwriters Category:American rock guitarists Category:American heavy metal musicians Category:Musicians from Los Angeles Category:Singers from Los Angeles Category:Writers from Los Angeles
title: Chuck Mosley
